divs: Sighting DetailsI was staying at a relatives house, having had a restless night and great difficulty trying to sleep. Something disturbed a possum which jumped out of a tree and ran across the roof above me. I then heard what sounded like an unusual sonic hissing and crackling sound - I can't describe it exactly. I looked out the window, and my attention was drawn towards a tall tree. Behind the tree there was a rotating ring of light, just hovering, and not doing much else. My heart has never pounded so fast in my life. I was too frightened to get out of bed to have a closer look because I didn't want to draw any attention to myself and was too frightened to even want to fall asleep. It made a hissing and crackling sound again, but it seemed more faint. This whole event went on until after dawn. I was I hoping the thing would go away and disappear when I heard a car drive up the street. But it was still there when I peeked out the window. Around 6am I finally went to sleep - for about two hours, and had a terrible day at work. The object was not there when I woke up.
